original_text: And when the children of Ammon saw that they had made themselves odious to David, Hanun and the children of Ammon sent a thousand talents of silver to hire them chariots and horsemen out of Mesopotamia, and out of Syriamaachah, and out of Zobah.
korean_text: 암몬 자손이 자기가 다윗에게 밉게 한 줄 안지라 하눈과 암몬 자손은 더불어 은 천 달란트를 아람 나하라임과 아람마아가와 소바에 보내 병거와 마병을 삯 내되

sentences.original_text: And when the children of Ammon saw
that they had made themselves odious to David
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다윗에게 미움을 받게 되었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: Hanun and the children of Ammon sent
to hire them chariots and horsemen
